items.sentence: I would hate to see him mess up one of his butterfly knife tricks.
Tom tried to show the picture to Mary without letting John see it.
I'll introduce you to a friend of mine who used to live in Boston.
I've never sewn a button on a shirt before. Could you show me how?
I hope that I'll have a chance to see you next time I'm in Boston.
My younger brother and I used to fight a lot when we were younger.
I should probably buy a few bottles of wine for the party tonight.
Tom realized he barely had enough money to buy what he had to buy.
A number of interesting objects are being exhibited at the museum.
The walls of the house are pale yellow, the shutters rust-colored.
